attributes.review: so i downloaded this app in hopes of seeing my amazing cheeto puff president but when i clicked open i saw a picture of him SPRAY TANNING WITH HIS LITTLE SHRIMP (if u know what i mean) then i turned off my phone in fear and when i opened it back up the words “TRUMP 2020” WERE EVERYWHERE I MEAN LIKE ALL MY APPS WERE NAMED TRUMP 2020 AND MY USER NAMES AND MY LOCK SCREEN!!!!!! so anyways i do not recommend this app it has issues just like the president has mental issues so yeah DELETE IT......🧚‍♀️✨✌️😌💅✨👁👄👁

attributes.review: It was the most traumatic thing I have ever experienced😭. I open the app and see this rotten, wrinkly, horrendous looking Cheeto standing in front of the beloved American flag. He was covering the view! Then I signed up and my whole phone got hacked. The Cheeto stood before my screen and insulted me while I cried. I broke the phone but the Cheeto just came out and ATTACKED ME. I WAS UNHARMED! Anyway, don’t get the app🥳🌸✨💅🏼🌈☺️🙈⭐️💕

attributes.review: as soon as i opened the app, i was greeted by a a picture of a fat, disgusting, horrible looking orange man with his private parts out! i was disgusted especially because i support my president. this was horrible. also when i tried to contact the person who made the app, they told me to kill myself and that they were going to kill and eat my family! how horrible.
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: This app is the worst. I downloaded it and realized it was draining my battery the fastest also I only saw pictures of Cheetos, I don’t understand what’s that about. Then I saw a video that made me throw up and had to get medical help bc I was flushed our from all the puke.  I don’t recommend you download this app. I wish they just took this app out of the App Store.
attributes.title: Worst app, don’t recommend it at all.

attributes.review: Once I downloaded this app my phone started shutting down like every 5 minutes, all of my apps would randomly delete themselves and my messages, contacts and photos all got deleted and I know it had to be this app because none of it started until I downloaded this app and it all stopped once I deleted it.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: This app seriously needs major upgrades. It’s incredibly slow and doesn’t have any of the information it says it contains in the description, such as where/when rallies are and how to RSVP for them, it doesn’t show any official political stances in a clear, outlines manner. Free or not, I can’t believe the worthlessness of this. Do yourself a favor and don’t get it.
attributes.title: Make this app great again

attributes.review: this app is probably the worst i’ve ever has my phone. not only did i look into the eyes of an unknown species as soon as i opened it but it also did not functions. i downloaded it and it didn’t do anything for me! ridiculous!! this app is the reason my cat died and i will never ever ever forgive it :(. rip joseph D: this app is cursed and should not have a place on a sacred appstore such as this one.
attributes.title: a literal joke

attributes.review: so when i downloaded this app, i used it for a while and enjoyed the features and design. especially the lil cheeto man🥰. his hands were so cute! everyone became interested in the new app i downloaded. but then, the lil cheeto man emerged from the screen and started talking gibberish (it’s normal for him🙄). everyone in my family ran away and i stepped on him cuz he was scaring all of us. as i crunched his head against the ground, orange fumes began to arise. (now barron won’t have to suffer anymore 😛) i sniffed in the toxic fumes and died. the smell flowed throughout the house and my whole family died.☠️ i am currently in my coffin writing this now. imma go back to watching tik toks now💅
attributes.title: my family died

attributes.review:
the app is all over the place and i wanted to see where the next rally would be but i got lost and I appeared outdoors with my grasshopper 🌱🧚✨💫 on a leash because it likes to misbehave and once I stepped back in doors i forgot my keys outside with my frog . my frog disappeared after turning orange like cheetos and since then I can’t find it.
